name: Fighting Snakes
description:
A new kind of the Snake Game where one has to fight multiple evil snakes for space and food in order to survive.

Each level is more challenging with increasing number of evil snakes to fight. There are dozens of increasingly difficult levels.

The game offers:

• Intuitive gesture-based control
• Various types of helpful and harmful objects to investigate, consume, avoid, or use in the fight.
• Several snake speed options
• Several color schema options
